page.title: 12Housing
page.content: The{housing}in Dorridge is in the luxury class with the average cost of each property being about Â£50,000.At the top end of the market{property}can cost as much as Â£100,000. Most properties are four bed-roomed detached family houses with large gardens owned by the professional people who make up most of the population.Nearly every house is equipped with a two car garage to cater for the large car owning population. A great deal of the housing has been built in the last fifteen years on what was jealously guarded 'green belt' land and so was planned with a low density per acre. The streets are spacious and well designed and at night extremely well lit.
